properties.name: Baby Park near college
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby More before-college action, at a little park for innocent children where we kissed and cuddled... and groped ;) And while you were doing your magic remove-the-bra trick, people with dogs were walking past!

properties.name: Back of Spar Shop
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby A trip to the Spar Shop for my Mum got a little randy! So I pulled you into a bushy area near the back of the shop, and gave Mr Happi just what he needed :D ..and came out with leaves in each others hair, hehe

properties.name: Back of someone's back gate!
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyA small one time fondleage moment, when it was late at night, and Mrs Happi needed some treatment! So we picked a secluded path which lead to the back of some houses and put me against the fence to get me moanin!

properties.name: Barley Mow
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyLots of smooches, flowing wine, the occasional arsehole and ***kinty solos!*** Yaaay! • DOGBOOOOOOOOOOONE • First time I saw my baby play! ..And you *had* to embarass me by making me get up, (cringe!) • Putting makeup on my baby in the back room, fun :D • You got your bum bum pinched by a crazy drunken lady! I was ready to kick some arse, heh • Encore: SABBATH

properties.name: Big Wood in Sankey Valley
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyLog action baby yeaaaah! (Wonder if the towels still there.... teeheehee)

properties.name: Bridge near college
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyTwas a sunny day, and you were walking me to school, all suited up, and we lay in the shade, in a quiet spot by a bridge...... and got fondle-happy!!

properties.name: Bushes by the Graffitti Wall
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyOne time we got a bit desperate for some fondleage so we went for a wander and got our fondle on in the bushes! Twas a full moon.. and you were bending me over and workin it Secretary style! Hehehe...

properties.name: Graffitti Wall
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyBack in the days when we walked home from Sammy\'s college together, and before the days we were *doooin it*, hehe, this was our pitstop for a smooch and a fondle... in daylight!

properties.name: Kinty's House
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby34 Orford Road, WarringtonRomance when the parents are in, hardcore when the parents are out! :D • The magic started here first, when it *accidentally* slipped in! • The first moments of fondleage happened in that bedroom too... hehehehe • And a couple of sessions in the lounge ;) • Food fun with wine and chocolade joining in the love. Not forgetting the cream! ... HEHEHEEEEEE • And how could I forget the bleeding incident... lol

properties.name: Odeon Cinema
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby 100 westbrook centre, warringtonThe most memorable thing about White Noise 2? ...Me taking my panties off :P

properties.name: Sammy's House
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby38 Livingstone Close, Old Hall, WarringtonMany a secret little love moment has been shared here! • New Year\'s Eve - House to ourselves! A lot of fiddling fun went on that night, in every room of the house! I remember being bent over the chair moaning ;) hehehe • New Year\'s Day – Oh dear, fighting with Pete! :S But it all ended well when we got to fall asleep together for the first time side by side :) A beautiful way to start 2007 with my baby next to me! • Valentine\'s Day – you tried my Valentine\'s boxers on upstairs in my bathroom, and one thing lead to another, lol! • Those few times we pretended we were getting moisturising cream for your face, but we were actually going upstairs for a quick fondle ;)

properties.name: Scary Wood
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyScary Wood on the way to the cinema was home to some desperate fuckage at Easter 2007! Pure daylight, a big of log action, and then banging against trees!

properties.name: Secluded Car Park
properties.description: Posted by Fudgybaby Secluded spot for in-car action! • Nearly got caught by police when we did it outside! • Some memorable moments for Mr Happi and me ;) Hehe • 7 month anniversary!!! Romantic burning (and tearing, lol) of old pictures in the bin nearby... and then we got our groove on in the back seat :D

properties.name: Secluded Spot near college
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyA little spot, by a main road, surrounded by trees, by the back of people\'s houses, where we used to escape for some rough \'n\' tumble before I had to go to college, hehehe!

properties.name: Secret Nook
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyThe secret nook by a fence on the way home from work.. home to a couple of late night quickies ;)

properties.name: Shawn's House

But falling asleep together on the dining room floor was sweeeeet romance :) ...And then a bit more action on the sofa the next morning...... And then a bit more action in the bathroom too :D

properties.name: The Hill outside Odeon
properties.description: Posted by FudgybabyMy choice for a not-so-secluded location for some after-movie fondleage! And muddy knees :D

properties.name: The Roleplay Woods!
